attributes.action: GIVE UP HIS POSITION AS PM AS HE AND HIS PARTY HAVE CRIPPLED THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I NEIL MILBURN would like to start a petition to remove the labour party from office before they totaly destroy the country , I doubt that i am not the only 1 to think this way, every corner we turn we get hit with some kind of tax so the government can look after foreign nationals who come in to england to sponge off the benifit system , how much longer is going to be before some 1 takes a stand against the government over fuel prices are they so high because of the duty on it of course it is and why arnt the government looking into other fuel and energy sources ? answer because there making so much money in taxes on petrol and diesal , so its 2 fingers up to the environment money is more important, as for the justice system there isnt 1 people dont mind going to jail they get treated so well and receiving compensation for human rights violations there in jail for a reason they dont have any rights what about the victims of crimes rights?? sorry i forgot the criminals have more rights nowadays dont they ,to sum it up this government is a joke bunch of over paid nobodys who are frightend they upset any 1 the sooner there out the better , this supposed to be england i aint proud to be english any more

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
